title: Surviving Emotional Overwhelm
subtitle: When feelings become too much to bear
description: For when emotions are so intense they feel unbearable. Simple, immediate tools for riding the wave until it passes.

questions.question: How long do intense emotions typically last if we don't fight them?
options: About 90 seconds to 20 minutes for the peak intensity

questions.question: What is the goal when overwhelmed by emotion?
options: Analyze why you feel this way
Ride the wave until intensity naturally decreases
